message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take 100k, and we'll call it a day.
Let's split it 50/50, Alice. It's a fair deal.
Let's be reasonable, Bob.  I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I still need the majority share.  Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to compromise, Alice. I'll take 60% and you can have 40%. It's a fair split.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
I'm not budging, Alice. I'll take 70% and you can have 30%. This is my final offer.
